form.official-title: To amend title X of the Public Health Service Act with respect to adoption and other pregnancy options counseling.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Adoption Promotion Act of 2015.

section.header: Adoption and other pregnancy options counseling
section.text: Title X of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300a–1) is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

section.header: Adoption and other pregnancy options counseling

subsection.text: The Secretary shall ensure that any pregnancy options counseling funded under this title includes adoption counseling.
The Secretary shall ensure that any pregnancy options counseling funded under this title is provided by individuals who—

paragraph.text: are licensed social workers or counselors in the States in which they practice; and
have knowledge and experience in adoption practice.

subsection.text: Any training provided to an individual under section 1003 shall include training on the adoption process.

paragraph.text: Research funded under section 1004 shall include—

subparagraph.text: the collection of data on the number of pregnancy tests administered to individuals served by programs under this title and the results of those tests; and
the evaluation of the quality, consistency, and outcomes of pregnancy options counseling funded under this title.

paragraph.text: Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to authorize the collection of personally identifiable information.
